pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Robocorp Control Room Asset Storage API library`robocorp-storage` is a library which provides read and write access to the*Asset Storage* in Robocorp **Control Room**.## Usage```pythonfrom robocorp import storagedef store_email(): storage.set_text("cosmin", "cosmin@robocorp.com") print("E-mail:", storage.get_text("cosmin")) storage.delete_asset("cosmin")```
